item.title: Lab
item.description: I’ve got a home lab where I’m configuring a pseudo-enterprise environment, complete with virtualized bastion servers. Network Equipment Router: Ubiquiti EdgeRouter X Crazy powerful box for $50. Nice WebUI, and has a hardware switch chip, so it does actual gigabit. WAP: Asus RT-AC68U with Merlin Firmware Great WAP, and it was a great router until I got gigabit Internet. I saved some money getting a T-Mobile-branded refurb on Amazon for $77, and reflashing it.
